description:
LinkedIn is the largest professional network in the world. With each member having at least 100 connections, ensuring that anyone can have at least a network of 10,000 people.

This course will teach you step by step how to construct a LinkedIn profile. Each lecture illustrates a section of the profile and I explain what is required in that section, followed by a short screen capture of my own personal live profile. In order to achieve maximum benefit from this course I suggest that you have your LinkedIn profile available to edit.

I recommend that you pause the course after each lecture and complete the relevant section of your profile in real time, thereby making it a practical experience, putting into practice immediately what you've learnt. You are free to post questions inside Udemy or tweet your questions using the hashtag #LinkedInstinct.

Whether your an employee, business owner, student, graduate or volunteer, it is essential for you to be on LinkedIn and know how to create an outstanding profile.

There has never been a better time to be engaged on LinkedIn and develop your professional reputation in your industry and with your ideal audience.
title: Mastering Your Profile on LinkedIn
